data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Six Months Ended 30Th September 2022
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulations 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (''Listing Regulations''), as amended from time to time, (''Listing Regulations''), and further to our letter dated 7th October 2022, we are submitting: -

1. Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and six months ended 30th September 2022 along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors.

2. Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and six months ended 30th September 2022 along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors.

data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 7th January 2022, we are submitting: -

1. Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2021 along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors.

2. Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2021 along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results & Limited Review Report For The Quarter Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body:
1. Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th September 2021 along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors.

2. Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th September 2021 along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Unaudited Financial Results & Limited Review Report for the Quarter ended 30th June 2021

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter & Year Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, 28th April, 2021 have approved and taken on record the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter & year ended 31st March 2021. The same are enclosed alongwith the respective Audit Reports thereon.

At the said Meeting, the Board of Directors have recommended a Dividend of Rs. 1.20/- per Equity Share of Rs.10/- each (12%) for the Financial Year 2020-21 subject to the approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter & Year Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, 28th April, 2021 have approved and taken on record the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter & year ended 31st March 2021. The same are enclosed alongwith the respective Audit Reports thereon.

At the said Meeting, the Board of Directors have recommended a Dividend of Rs. 1.20/- per Equity Share of Rs.10/- each (12%) for the Financial Year 2020-21 subject to the approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
